short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An auxiliary extension to link your social media accounts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps with linking your social media account cookies to Wimtorq which subsequently uses these cookies to post adverts on your behalf to your accounts, securely.
